AtLeastOneConstructor.description:
Description

Each non-static class should declare at least one constructor.
Classes with solely static members are ignored, refer toUseUtilityClassRuleto detect those.

Example(s):

Use this rule with the default properties by just referencing it:

Use this rule and customize it:
AtLeastOneConstructor.option:
Name	Default Value	Description
ignoredAnnotations	lombok.Data , lombok.Value , lombok.Builder , lombok.NoArgsConstructor , lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor , lombok.AllArgsConstructor	Fully qualified names of the annotation types that should be ignored by this rule
